item.title: How do u get the shops to give u 10 items when u click Buy 10... ? @HELP NEEDED@
item.dc:creator: @ionforeva ionforeva
item.description:
@ionforeva wrote:

hmm well ill tell where to post AND remember backup ur files

ok search

sM("Item not supported " + (playerItems[fromSlot] - 1));

and underneith the last } paiste

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0
&& itemID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] - 1)) {
if (amount > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot]) {
amount = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot];
}

        double ShopValue;
        double TotPrice;
        int TotPrice2;
        int Overstock;
        int Slot = 0;
        int Slot2 = 0;
   int Slot3 = 0;

        for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
            TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(
                    GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
            Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
            Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
            if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) {
                sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                break;
            }

if (amount > 100) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount;
Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
if(TotPrice2 <= 1) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
}
if (TotPrice2 <= 0) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}

tell me if it helped mate

Read full topic

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0
&& itemID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] - 1)) {
if (amount > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot]) {
amount = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot];
}

        double ShopValue;
        double TotPrice;
        int TotPrice2;
        int Overstock;
        int Slot = 0;
        int Slot2 = 0;
    int Slot3 = 0;

        for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
            TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(
                    GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
            Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
            Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
            if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) {
                sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                break;
            }

if (amount > 100) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount;
Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
if(TotPrice2 <= 1) {

}
if (TotPrice2 <= 0) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;

} else {

} else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {

deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else {

}[/quote]

item.dc:creator: @ionforeva ionforeva
item.description:
@ionforeva wrote:

ok mate i aint sure but lets see this could be the code your looking for if it is ill tell where to put it k?

public boolean buyItem(int itemID, int fromSlot, int amount) {
if (amount > 0
&& itemID
== (server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] - 1)) {
if (amount > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot]) {
amount = server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot];
}

        double ShopValue;
        double TotPrice;
        int TotPrice2;
        int Overstock;
        int Slot = 0;
        int Slot2 = 0;
    int Slot3 = 0;

        for (int i = amount; i > 0; i--) {
            TotPrice2 = (int) Math.floor(
                    GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
            Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
            Slot2 = GetItemSlot(6529);
            if (Slot == -1 && MyShopID != 8 && MyShopID != 19) {
                sM("You don't have enough coins.");
                break;
            }

if (amount > 100) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot))*amount;
Slot = GetItemSlot(995);
if (Slot == -1 && TotPrice2 != 0) {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
if(TotPrice2 <= 1) {
TotPrice2 = (int)Math.floor(GetItemShopValue(itemID, 0, fromSlot));
}
if (TotPrice2 <= 0) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= 1;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else if (playerItemsN[Slot] >= TotPrice2) {
if (freeSlots() > 0) {
deleteItem(995, GetItemSlot(995), TotPrice2);
addItem(itemID, amount);
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsN[MyShopID][fromSlot] -= amount;
server.shopHandler.ShopItemsDelay[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
if ((fromSlot + 1) > server.shopHandler.ShopItemsStandard[MyShopID]) {
server.shopHandler.ShopItems[MyShopID][fromSlot] = 0;
}
} else {
sM(“Not enough space in your inventory.”);
}
} else {
sM(“You don’t have enough coins.”);
}
